articles.title: ‘Thank You America!’: Ukraine’s Zelensky and Israel’s Netanyahu hail House passage of $95 billion foreign aid package - CNN
articles.description: Foreign leaders say the decision will help defend democracy and Western civilization. Ukrainian troops say it’s a morale booster. On Kyiv’s streets, there’s gratitude – and realism.
articles.content:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu have thanked US lawmakers after they voted in favor of new aid packages for their countries worth billions of dollars.
